title: Won with requirements for "Close Combat", didn't get mission complete.
body:
Just finished a game using {{champion:58}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:83}} as a premade, won, and didn't get credit for the "close combat" mission. Nobody else in my premade got it either...

Pls rito help.

EDIT: Match history link - http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2611571826/36752493?tab=overview

replies.body: stupid mission...total useless to not provide a tool to do so. Ya let the toxic lol community figure it out alone. GJ RITO

Bump
All of us in the premade had the Icon
Ekko Rakan Cho'gath Shaco Vi
http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2612287634/45897093?tab=overview
Was everyone using a worlds icon for this year?
I don't see that in the requirements, but I'm pretty sure everybody was.

All missions need to have some kind of Worlds 2017 icon being used by the player. The poro one that you get for pick'em counts as well as the Ashe icon from the 120 tokens.

All missions do state with a worlds icon on.

Not trying to be a douche, but it isn't stated: https://i.imgur.com/BzT8LWY.png 

Even so, I'm pretty sure we all had a Worlds Icon equipped

That might be why it's bugged up. And it wasn't even premade the first time it was shown either.

https://gyazo.com/0419e2773292fa2307493447454174e6

They at least did it here.
